display_long_description:
# A MULTIPLAYER ROGUELITE SURVIVAL GAME

After a birthday party goes haywire, the world now faces an onslaught of endless swarms of angry piñatas! As the last line of defense, you are humanity’s final hope in the VRmageddon. The mission is simple: survive the party apocalypse or succumb to sweet defeat! 🍬💥☠️

[media]
# FIGHT AGAINST ANGRY PIÑATAS 
Tons of unique piñatas, each with their own behaviors, actions, and a few deadly tricks.

[media]
# CHALLENGE EPIC BOSSES
Insanely big and monstrous Mega Piñatas, like the OctoCat, will test even the most skilled fighters.

[media]
# UNLOCK WEAPON EVO'S & GADGETS
Master both melee and ranged Weapons and enhance them with Gadgets to create new Weapon Evolutions.

[media]
# PLAY SOLO OR PARTY UP
Rally on your own or with friends as Kit Bash, Roxy Riot, Paparoni, Mamagyver, Lt. Gran, or Max Magnifique.

[media]
# TAKE ON UNIQUE STAGES & MISSIONS
Each area has its own stage objective and also offers new dangers and opportunities for mayhem.

[media]

# A MULTIPLAYER ROGUELITE SURVIVAL GAME

After a birthday party goes haywire, the world now faces an onslaught of endless swarms of angry piñatas! As the last line of defense, you are humanity’s final hope in the VRmageddon. The mission is simple: survive the party apocalypse or succumb to sweet defeat! 🍬💥☠️

# FIGHT AGAINST ANGRY PIÑATAS 
Tons of unique piñatas, each with their own behaviors, actions, and a few deadly tricks.

Insanely big and monstrous Mega Piñatas, like the OctoCat, will test even the most skilled fighters.

Master both melee and ranged Weapons and enhance them with Gadgets to create new Weapon Evolutions.

Each area has its own stage objective and also offers new dangers and opportunities for mayhem.
